title.narrative: Research and development of integrated crop management for mango production

description.narrative: Mangoes are an economically important crop in the Philippines. Declining production yields and poor quality of fruit has been attributed to high pest and disease pressure, unproductive poorly nourished trees and the high costs of inputs. This new project aims to address mango yield and quality issues by adopting an Integrated Crop Management approach as successfully demonstrated in a previous ACIAR project (HORT/2007/067). The information, technology and linkages formed from this and previous projects will be developed into a set of “best practices” and disseminated to farmers. The project also aims to improve capacity and training of extension and scientific staff to deliver the crop management packages.
